item.title: UBS calls Hoka sneaker maker a 'significantly underappreciated growth stock'
item.description: UBS' price forecast for Deckers Outdoors implies that the Hoka sneaker maker could rally 34% from here.

item.title: Nvidia, Opendoor on list of retail traders' favorite stocks heading into September
item.description: Nvidia topped the list of top 10 single stocks with largest weekly retail order imbalance over the past week, according to JPMorgan's data.

item.title: Top Wall Street analysts recommend these 3 stocks for long-term investors
item.description: TipRanks' ranking service highlights three stocks favored by top flight analysts, including Palo Alto Networks and MongoDB.

item.title: This Chinese property stock is defying the slump and poised to soar, Barclays predicts
item.description: One Chinese property company is not only defying the market slump but also returning money to shareholders.

item.title: Look at global banks and gold miners as strong picks, Lazard portfolio manager says
item.description: Lazard Asset Management is finding opportunities in several European and Asian banks, chipmakers and global gold miners.
